articles.description: Previous outbreaks have been reported in Angola, Democratic Republic of Congo, Kenya, South Africa, and Uganda.
articles.content:
July 21, 2022
MANILA, Philippines The Marburg virus disease (MVD) is epidemic-prone, the World Health Organization (WHO) said, stressing that it can spread easily if not prevented.
